languages.text: {n}Вы приходите в себя лишь со звуком вечернего корабельного гонга и с удивлением замечаете, как нарывающие волдыри иссохли, и покраснения кожи стали едва заметны.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: затемнить экран перед куем, словно прошло какое-то время
затемнить экран перед куем, словно прошло какое-то время

languages.text: {n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы приходите в себя лишь со звуком вечернего корабельного гонга и с удивлением замечаете, как нарывающие волдыри иссохли, и покраснения кожи стали едва заметны.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It's not before the ship's evening gong is sounded that you come to and note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and the skin reddenings are barely visible.{/n}
{n}It's not before the ship's evening gong is sounded that you come to and note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and the skin reddenings are barely visible.{/n}

{n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}

{n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}

{n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}

{n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En algún momento, el gong de la noche de la nave te saca de tu estupor, y te sorprende descubrir que las ampollas han desaparecido de tu cuerpo y apenas queda una rojez en los puntos antes inflamados de tu piel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En algún momento, el gong de la noche de la nave te saca de tu estupor, y te sorprende descubrir que las ampollas han desaparecido de tu cuerpo y apenas queda una rojez en los puntos antes inflamados de tu piel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ふと船の夕方のゴングがあなたの昏睡を解いた。すると、膿んだ水ぶくれが消え炎症を起こしていた部分の赤さがほぼなっていないことに気が付き、あなたは驚いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ふと船の夕方のゴングがあなたの昏睡を解いた。すると、膿んだ水ぶくれが消え炎症を起こしていた部分の赤さがほぼなっていないことに気が付き、あなたは驚いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}不知过了多久，船上的晚锣响了，将你从麻木的状态中解放出来。你惊奇地注意到，你皮肤上的脓肿消失了，原本发炎的地方，红色的皮疹几乎已经完全消退了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不知过了多久，船上的晚锣响了，将你从麻木的状态中解放出来。你惊奇地注意到，你皮肤上的脓肿消失了，原本发炎的地方，红色的皮疹几乎已经完全消退了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Irgendwann holt der Abendgong des Schiffs dich aus deiner Benommenheit, und du bemerkst überrascht, dass deine entzündeten Blasen verschwunden sind und deine Haut an den fraglichen Stellen sogar kaum noch gerötet ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Irgendwann holt der Abendgong des Schiffs dich aus deiner Benommenheit, und du bemerkst überrascht, dass deine entzündeten Blasen verschwunden sind und deine Haut an den fraglichen Stellen sogar kaum noch gerötet ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Au bout d'un long moment, le gong du vaisseau, annonciateur de la fin de la journée, vient vous sortir de votre torpeur léthargique, et vous constatez à votre plus grande surprise que vos cloques purulentes ont disparu et que les rougeurs inflammatoires se sont nettement estompées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout d'un long moment, le gong du vaisseau, annonciateur de la fin de la journée, vient vous sortir de votre torpeur léthargique, et vous constatez à votre plus grande surprise que vos cloques purulentes ont disparu et que les rougeurs inflammatoires se sont nettement estompées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir noktada geminin akşam gongu seni uyuşmuş hâlinden çıkarıyor ve apseli kabarcıklarının yok olduğunu ve kısa süre önce cayır cayır yanan teninde pek kızarıklık bile kalmadığını şaşkınlıkla fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At some point the ship's evening gong breaks your stupor, and you note with surprise that your abscessed blisters are gone and your skin is now barely even red where it was previously inflamed.{/n}
